prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a muscular asian man, spiked black hair with one long fringe, wearing silver rimmed glasses, a purple martial arts gi, focused and intelligent expression
feature_prompt: visible fabric weave on gi, sharp focus on silver glasses frame, realistic texture on hair strands, hyperdetailed skin texture
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic texture, smooth skin, doll, flat lighting, low quality, blurry glasses, deformed anatomy
